name: inhibiting
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
inhibit
to prevent someone from doing something by making them feel nervous or embarrassed : Some workers were inhibited (from speaking) by the presence of their managers.
to slow down a process or the growth of something: This drug inhibits the growth of tumours.
